credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Plate IV, vol. II of  "Le Antichita Romane"
description:
Vertical Rectangle. Fragment of the facade of a Roman Building, Bearing the inscription: "C. POBLICIO. L. F. BIBVLO..." Below, scale, and six-line inscription. Inscribed, lower right : "Piranesi Archit. Dis. et. inc."

Focillon 226
name: Print
